title: Font for Harvard Magazine
content:
Hi. I am curious what font is used for Harvard Magazine. Thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20121112140541/http:/typophile.com/files/font_117.jpg) | 7.16 KB |
author: yjs304

comments.content: It looks like [Adobe Caslon](http://web.archive.org/web/20121112140541/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/caslon/). They sure like their Caslons at Harvard; [The Harvard Crimson](http://web.archive.org/web/20121112140541/http:/www.thecrimson.com/index.aspx) use Big Caslon for their banner.
